Locale.Value:
We’ve introduced and upgraded some features to help you make even more amazing videos
1. You can now access projects from desktop and mobile on CapCut Cloud Space.
2. Italian, French, Turkish, Chinese, Dutch, Vietnamese, Thai, Malay, and Romanian are now supported in auto captions.
3. “Split scene” is availble now. Right click to try it out. You can split scene of the videos on the video tracks and material panel to make your re-creation more efficient.
4. You can now undo importing material and deleting materials in Local.
5. You can now use commercial music for TikTok commercial use.
6. Fixed the issue of video flash after clip splitting.
7. Fixed the issue of duration change after adding transitions.
